Name: zho-anonymousgroupo-la
Author: Anonymous Group Of Translators
Source: Goodword Books , http://www.goodwordbooks.com/ , Center for Peace and Spirituality , https://www.cpsglobal.org/

Translations.Text: Shang zai! Mei ge feibang zhe, dihui zhe
ta juji caichan, er dang zuo wuqi
ta yiwei ta de caichan, neng shi ta bu mie
Jue buran, ta bi 457 ding yao bei tou zai huimie keng zhong
Ni zen neng zhidao huimie keng shi shenme
Shi zhenzhu de ranzhe de liehuo
Neng sheng dao ren de xin shang
Tamen biding yao bei guan zai liehuo zhong
diao zai xuduo hen gao de zhuzi shang
